Class DisplayFrame 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----DisplayFrame
public class DisplayFrame
extends Object
DisplayFrame.java holds DisplayFrameElements for one frame of a recording.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

DisplayFrame()

append(DisplayFrameElement)
add to frame one element, appended to end of a list.
first()
sets current frame to the first frame in the sequence.
next()
returns next element in sequence.
